meanings.sent1: The overdaring squirrel leaped from tree to tree without fear.
meanings.sent2: She was criticized for her overdaring decision to confront the bully.
meanings.sent3: The overdaring puppy thought it could take on a much larger dog at the park.
meanings.sent4: His overdaring attempt to climb the steep mountain ended in disaster.
meanings.sent5: The overdaring stuntman amazed the crowd with his risky performance.

meanings.definition: To be excessively bold or audacious.
meanings.sent1: He overdaringly challenged the champion to a duel.
meanings.sent2: They overdaringly decided to sneak into the forbidden castle at night.
meanings.sent3: The kids overdaringly planned to prank their teacher on April Fools' Day.
meanings.sent4: She overdaringly asked her crush out on a date in front of everyone.
meanings.sent5: The detective overdaringly accused the wrong person of the crime.
